name: Crimson Amber Medallion
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 6%.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +1

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +2
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 8%.

info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> by 7%.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> by 9%.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +2
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> by 11%.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 11%.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +1
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 13%.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +2

name: Arsenal Charm
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 15%.

name: Arsenal Charm +1
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 17%.

name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 19%.

name: Erdtree's Favor
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 3%, <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 7%, and <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 5%.

name: Erdtree's Favor +1
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 3.5%, <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 8.5%, and <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 6.5%.

name: Erdtree's Favor +2
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 4%, <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 10%, and <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 8%.

name: Radagon's Scarseal
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">vigor</font>, <font color="#E0B985">endurance</font>, <font color="#E0B985">strength</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 3, but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 10%.

name: Radagon's Soreseal
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">vigor</font>, <font color="#E0B985">endurance</font>, <font color="#E0B985">strength</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 5, but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 15%.

name: Starscourge Heirloom
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">strength</font> by 5.

name: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 5.

name: Stargazer Heirloom
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font> by 5.

name: Two Fingers Heirloom
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">faith</font> by 5.

name: Silver Scarab
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">item discovery</font> by 75.

name: Moon of Nokstella
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">memory slots</font> by 2, allowing more spells to be memorized.

name: Green Turtle Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 8 per second.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">robustness</font> by 90.

<font color="#E0B985">Robustness:</font> Resistance to <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm +1
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">robustness</font> by 140.

<font color="#E0B985">Robustness:</font> Resistance to <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>.

name: Immunizing Horn Charm
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">immunity</font> by 90.

<font color="#E0B985">Immunity:</font> Resistance to <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>.

name: Immunizing Horn Charm +1
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">immunity</font> by 140.

<font color="#E0B985">Immunity:</font> Resistance to <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>.

name: Clarifying Horn Charm
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">focus</font> by 90.

<font color="#E0B985">Focus:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A698F4">sleep</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness</font>.

name: Clarifying Horn Charm +1
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">focus</font> by 140.

<font color="#E0B985">Focus:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A698F4">sleep</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness</font>.

name: Prince of Death's Pustule
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">vitality</font> by 90.

<font color="#E0B985">Vitality:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A17945">death blight</font>.

name: Prince of Death's Cyst
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">vitality</font> by 140.

<font color="#E0B985">Vitality:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A17945">death blight</font>.

name: Mottled Necklace
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">robustness</font>, <font color="#E0B985">immunity</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">focus</font> by 40.

<font color="#E0B985">Robustness:</font> Resistance to <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>.
<font color="#E0B985">Immunity:</font> Resistance to <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>.
<font color="#E0B985">Focus:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A698F4">sleep</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness</font>.

name: Mottled Necklace +1
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">robustness</font>, <font color="#E0B985">immunity</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">focus</font> by 60.

<font color="#E0B985">Robustness:</font> Resistance to <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> and <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>.
<font color="#E0B985">Immunity:</font> Resistance to <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>.
<font color="#E0B985">Focus:</font> Resistance to <font color="#A698F4">sleep</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness</font>.

name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
info:
Reduces <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 25%.

Although this item shows your poise stat increase by about 34%, this item doesn't actually increase your maximum poise. It only reduces the amount of poise damage that you receive from each attack.

This effect can be combined with the effects of Baldachin's Blessing to reduce <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 50.65%, or it can be combined with the effects of Radiant Baldachin's Blessing to reduce <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 58.75%.

name: Marika's Scarseal
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">mind</font>, <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font>, <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 3, but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 10%.

name: Marika's Soreseal
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">mind</font>, <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font>, <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 5, but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 15%.

name: Warrior Jar Shard
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of skills by 10%.

name: Shard of Alexander
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of skills by 15%.

name: Millicent's Prosthesis
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> by 5 and increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> after multiple attacks within a short time. There are 3 tiers of damage increase: 4%, 6%, and 11%.

The number of attacks required to trigger this effect varies per weapon, and is not based on damage or weapon speed. It generally requires 3-4 attacks to trigger the first tier, 5-8 attacks for the second, and 8-11 attacks for the third. Some weapons are too slow to trigger all tiers.

name: Magic Scorpion Charm
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage inflicted</font> by 12%, but reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 10%.

name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
info: Increases <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage inflicted</font> by 12%, but reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 10%.

name: Fire Scorpion Charm
info: Increases <font color="#F48C25">fire damage inflicted</font> by 12%, but reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 10%.

name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
info: Increases <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage inflicted</font> by 12%, but reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 10%.

name: Red-Feathered Branchsword
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 20% while HP is below 20%.

name: Ritual Sword Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10% while HP is at maximum.

name: Spear Talisman
info:
Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> of thrusting weapon counter-attacks by 15%.

A counter-attack is performed by hitting an enemy with a thrust attack at a precise time as they are in the process of doing an attack, just before they actually hit you. Not all enemy attacks allow for a counter-attack to be performed.

name: Hammer Talisman
info: Increases the amount of stamina removed with each attack from enemies who are guarding by 20%, making it easier to break their stance.

name: Winged Sword Insignia
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> after multiple attacks within a short time. There are 3 tiers of damage increase: 3%, 5%, and 10%.

The number of attacks required to trigger this effect varies per weapon, and is not based on damage or weapon speed. It generally requires 3-4 attacks to trigger the first tier, 5-8 attacks for the second, and 8-11 attacks for the third. Some weapons are too slow to trigger all tiers. Damage bonus resets if no attacks are performed within a short amount of time.

name: Rotten Winged Sword Insignia
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> after multiple attacks within a short time. There are 3 tiers of damage increase: 6%, 8%, and 13%.

The number of attacks required to trigger this effect varies per weapon, and is not based on damage or weapon speed. It generally requires 3-4 attacks to trigger the first tier, 5-8 attacks for the second, and 8-11 attacks for the third. Some weapons are too slow to trigger all tiers. Damage bonus resets if no attacks are performed within a short amount of time.

name: Dagger Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for critical attacks by 17%.

name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
info: Increases the range of arrows, bolts, and some spell projectiles by 65%.

name: Blue Dancer Charm
info:
Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> by up to 15% based on how low your <font color="#E0B985">equip load</font> is.

This is based on your total equip load, not the percentage compared to your maximum equip load. Increasing your maximum equip load will not improve the effect of this item.

name: Twinblade Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for final attack of a chain of regular melee attacks by 45%.

name: Axe Talisman
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of charged melee attacks by 10%.

This effect does not work for charged sorceries, incantations, or weapon skills.

name: Lance Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> by 15% while on horseback.

name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of arrows and bolts by 10%.

name: Lord of Blood's Exultation
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 20% for 20 seconds when <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> occurs nearby.

name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 20% for 20 seconds when <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> or <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font> occurs nearby.

name: Claw Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for jump attacks by 15%.

name: Roar Medallion
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for attacks caused or altered by roar and breath skills by 15%.

name: Curved Sword Talisman
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for guard counters by 20%.

A guard counter is performed by doing a strong attack immediately after blocking an enemy's attack.

name: Companion Jar
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of thrown pots by 20%.

name: Perfumer's Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of perfumes by 20%.

name: Graven-School Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of sorceries by 4%.

name: Graven-Mass Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of sorceries by 8%.

name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of incantations by 4%.

name: Flock's Canvas Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of incantations by 8%.

name: Old Lord's Talisman
info: Extends the duration of sorcery and incantation effects by 30%.

name: Radagon Icon
info:
Shortens the casting time of sorceries and incantations by the same amount as 30 levels in dexterity.

The shortest casting time is achieved at level 70 dexterity, so this will have no effect after that point.

name: Primal Glintstone Blade
info: Reduces FP cost of sorceries and incantations by 25% but reduces <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 15%.

name: Godfrey Icon
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of charged sorceries, incantations, and skills by 15%.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 10%.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1
info: Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 13%.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2
info: Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 17%.

name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 20%.

name: Spelldrake Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magical damage negation</font> by 13%.

name: Spelldrake Talisman +1
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magical damage negation</font> by 17%.

name: Spelldrake Talisman +2
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magical damage negation</font> by 20%.

name: Flamedrake Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font> by 13%.

name: Flamedrake Talisman +1
info: Increases <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font> by 17%.

name: Flamedrake Talisman +2
info: Increases <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font> by 20%.

name: Boltdrake Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 13%.

name: Boltdrake Talisman +1
info: Increases <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 17%.

name: Boltdrake Talisman +2
info: Increases <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 20%.

name: Haligdrake Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 13%.

name: Haligdrake Talisman +1
info: Increases <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 17%.

name: Haligdrake Talisman +2
info: Increases <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 20%.

name: Pearldrake Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font>, and <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 5%.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +1
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font>, and <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 7%.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +2
info: Increases <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font>, and <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 9%.

name: Crucible Scale Talisman
info: Reduces damage taken from critical attacks by 30%.

name: Crucible Feather Talisman
info:
Increases invulnerability duration for dodge rolls but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 30%.

This effect doesn't stack with the Windy Crystal Tear.

name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 50% while HP is below 20%.

name: Ritual Shield Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 30% while HP is at maximum.

name: Greatshield Talisman
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> by 10%.

name: Crimson Seed Talisman
info: Increases HP restoration from Flask of Crimson Tears by 20%.

name: Cerulean Seed Talisman
info: Increases FP restoration from Flask of Cerulean Tears by 20%.

name: Blessed Dew Talisman
info: Restores 2 HP per second.

name: Taker's Cameo
info: Restores 3% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30 when an enemy dies.

name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
info:
Restores 3% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30 after multiple melee attacks within a short time.

The number of attacks required to trigger this effect varies per weapon, but it generally requires 5-7 regular attacks. Heavy attacks, charged attacks, and some weapon skills are also capable of triggering it.

name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
info: Restores 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 85 after performing a critical attack.

name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
info: Restores 15 FP after a performing a critical attack.

name: Crepus's Vial
info: Negates all movement sounds made by the wearer.

name: Carian Filigreed Crest
info: Reduces FP consumed by skills by 25%.

name: Longtail Cat Talisman
info:
Negates all fall damage.

The height at which a fall is fatal remains the same even while under the effects of this item.

name: Shabriri's Woe
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Makes enemies more likely to attack you rather than an online co-op partner. Has no effect in single player.

name: Daedicar's Woe
info: Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 100%.

name: Furled Finger's Trick-Mirror
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Makes you take on the appearance of a Host of Fingers.

name: Host's Trick-Mirror
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Makes you take on the appearance of a summoned cooperator.

name: Entwining Umbilical Cord
info: Changes demeanour of your actions. Masculine characters wearing this will use feminine animations, and feminine characters wearing this will use masculine animations.

name: Ancestral Spirit's Horn
info: Restores 3 FP when an enemy dies.
